oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - John McDaniel - 2018-11-12
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Musicians Spotlight program featuring John McDaniel from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 12, 2018.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: John McDaniel;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (02:04) Opening Comments and performer introduction by Julea Thomerson / (07:28) Opening comments by John / (07:40) Introduces the first song / (08:53) Performs That's The Way Love Goes / (11:28) Introduces the next song / (12:45) Performs A Million Beers / (15:32) Introduces the next song / (16:24) Performs Show You Love / (20:34) Talks about meeting Wayne Moss, working with Nashville musicians and introduces Wayne Moss in the audience and then introduces the next song / (29:42) Performs Haggard Songs / (33:10) Tells story about Artimus Pyle in the recording studio and introduces the next song / (38:19) Performs You Can't Get Off With Your Shoes On / (40:55) Tells Barefoot Jerry and Richie Albright story and introduces Fred Newell in the audience / (45:04) Performs Dreaming My Dreams / (47:09) Talks about Fred Newell's guitar playing / (48:21) Introduces the next song / (48:56) Performs Mammas Don't Let Your Babies Grow Up To Be Cowboys / (52:06) Talks about Bobby Keyes / (54:18) Introduces the next song / (54:59) Performs Sweet Virginia / (56:15) Tells Bobby Keyes story / (56:41) Tells Billy Cox story and introduces the next song / (57:31) Performs Lick Creek Road / (59:23) Talks about his career to date / (01:00:16) Final comments / (01:00:43) Performs Trying To Get To You / (01:02:40) Closing comments / (01:03:00) Walk-out music / (01:03:26) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: McDaniel, John; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
